title: WTS: 8 T's and and 1 "E" w/"AP" Leifield
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: WTS: 8 T's and and 1 "E" w/"AP" Leifield
posts.post_content:
Looking to get some focus back in my collecting and so the following are now available--Will send back scans upon request, any major issue w/back will be noted. First PM on any cards will get preferential treatment. Please add $3 for shipping no matter how many you buy...Prices are firm.

T205 Leifield, "A.P." on Front (tough variation). Fair/creased. $65
T205 PFeister. Sovereign Green Back. Gd mk back-tiny penmark squiggle. $25--SOLD
T205 Gibson. F/G $20
T205 Reulbach F $15-- SOLD 
T205 Richie F $15--- SOLD 

T206 Smith. SGC 20 1.5 Fair. Nice color. $20
T206 Herzog. Star mark (stamp) on back. Gd. $20---SOLD
T206 Merkle. PSA 4 VGEX. $75---SOLD

E95 Leach. F/G Creasing. $20----SOLD

Updated original thread with sales, email sent re: Leifield to Ray...New card Bresnahan w/Bat $40 (+3 ship). Pretty Nice Piedmont back with no paper loss.

Card came yesterday, very happy with it. All the best.. THX Ralph
